Item ID19701

The jar of darkness is a rare drop from Skotizo. Players can right click the View option on the jar to have the game screen go black for a brief moment, with the chatbox stating You view the darkness.

The jar can be used on a boss lair display in a player's Achievement Gallery to have a display of Skotizo. Doing so requires killing it at least once.

The drop rate of the jar of darkness is exceptionally low relative to the time required to obtain dark totems, taking upwards of thousands of hours on average to obtain one. This was considered an oversight by Mod Arcane during a weekly Q&A session, though Mod Roq, who developed the content, stated that he "liked [the rate] where it is".[1] Ultimately, the drop rate was polled to be increased from 1/2,500 to 1/500, but failed by 3% of the required votes.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Skotizo321 11/2,500

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text is a reference to the expression "where the sun don't shine".

References[edit | edit source]

  1. â†‘ Jagex. "OSRS Modcast (Q&A) - Minigames, Darkmeyer, and More!." (7m 43s), YouTube video. 17 June 2020.

[[File:Jar of darkness detail.png|left|90px]]
The '''jar of darkness''' is a rare drop from [[Skotizo]]. Players can right click the ''View'' option on the jar to have the game screen go black for a brief moment, with the chatbox stating ''You view the darkness''.

The jar can be used on a [[boss lair display]] in a player's [[Achievement Gallery]] to have a display of Skotizo. Doing so requires killing it at least once.

The drop rate of the jar of darkness is exceptionally low relative to the time required to obtain [[dark totem]]s, taking upwards of thousands of hours on average to obtain one. This was considered an oversight by [[Mod Arcane]] during a weekly Q&A session, though [[Mod Roq]], who developed the content, stated that he "liked [the rate] where it is".{{CiteVideo|author=Jagex|title=OSRS Modcast (Q&A) - Minigames, Darkmeyer, and More!|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OVZvafHYmD8&feature=youtu.be&t=463|timestamp=7m 43s|date=17 June 2020|site=YouTube}} Ultimately, the drop rate was [[Poll:Old School Content Poll 73: The :Joy: of Polls|polled]] to be increased from 1/2,500 to 1/500, but failed by 3% of the required votes.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Jar of darkness}}

==Trivia==
*The examine text is a reference to the expression "[https://idioms.thefreedictionary.com/where+the+sun+don%27t+shine where the sun don't shine]".
